body: Hi guys, thx for helping! I'm starting to discover grasshopper and was testing Butterfly plugin, trying to run a airflow test according to Mostapha's tutorial; but I ran into a error that I can't think of any solution (or maybe undertand what's happening) right now [](http://api.ning.com/files/lHtNjavnNiOKSQoKmYFD6iFauo4TKOdTnWLxHdvfGE5-XPF-xdytfWfD2i1OG3ncuSw-qy5niDiTRzuxuCrspPVx1SXsceWr/Imagem1.png?width=750) How can I correct what's wrong with my mesh?
